basic.floral_language:
Viola tricolor
Floriography: happy, sensibility, positive 
Pansy commonly known as the cat's face, is the national flower of Iceland and Poland. 
Each Pansy flower usually has three colors: purple, white and yellow, hence the name. Pansy color is more and richer, all sorts of color collocation together like the cat's face, like a butterfly. Generally plant in the flower bed, garden or balcony. 
Pansy like sunny place and can be sowed all season. Flowering around 2 months after planting, and ornamental period of 2-3 weeks.
basic.blooming: With different planting time, flowers year around, viewing period 2-3 weeks
basic.color: Each flower has generally pink, white, yellow in mixture

maintenance.soil: Peat or soil with specific nutrients
maintenance.sunlight: Like sunshine, put in sunny places, shade properly under summer strong light when in dormancy
maintenance.watering: Water thoroughly when soil is dry, short dormancy in summer, reduce watering
maintenance.fertilization: Dilute fertilizers following instructions,  apply 1-2 times monthly before flowering, reduce fertilization in summer
maintenance.pruning: Remove old, diseased and dead leaves timely
